content.headline: Joby Demonstrates Autonomous Flight in United States Air Force ‘Agile Flag’ Exercise
content.summary: SANTA CRUZ, Calif., August 26, 2024--Joby Aviation, Inc. (NYSE:JOBY), a next-generation aviation company, today announced that it demonstrated autonomous logistics aircraft operations in an evolving mission environment, in partnership with the U.S. Air Force during the ‘Agile Flag 24-3’ exercise.

content.headline: Joby Aviation: It's Going To Be A Long While Before This Plane Flies
Joby Rolls Third Aircraft Off Production Line, Reports Second Quarter 2024 Financial Results
content.summary: SANTA CRUZ, Calif., August 07, 2024--Joby Aviation, Inc. (NYSE:JOBY), a next-generation aviation company, today announced it has rolled its third production prototype aircraft off the company’s pilot production line in Marina, CA, with four aircraft expected to be in active flight test during the next quarter.
